statements: SELECT * FROM reports;
SELECT report_id, revenue FROM reports;
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_roi FROM reports WHERE revenue > 1000;
SELECT * FROM reports WHERE acquisition_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM reports ORDER BY campaign_roi DESC, revenue ASC;
SELECT * FROM reports WHERE revenue > 1000 ORDER BY revenue DESC
SELECT report_id, revenue, acquisition_date FROM reports WHERE acquisition_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY acquisition_date ASC
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_roi FROM reports WHERE campaign_roi < 0.5 ORDER BY campaign_name
SELECT campaign_name, revenue FROM reports WHERE revenue BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY revenue DESC, campaign_name ASC
SELECT * FROM reports WHERE acquisition_date > '2020-06-01' AND campaign_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY acquisition_date DESC
SELECT * FROM reports_on_revenue;
SELECT campaign_name, revenue FROM reports_on_revenue WHERE roi > 1;
SELECT campaign_name, revenue FROM reports_on_revenue ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT * FROM reports_on_revenue WHERE roi < 0.5;
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_cost FROM reports_on_revenue WHERE revenue > 1000;
SELECT * FROM reports_on_revenue ORDER BY report_id DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, revenue, roi FROM reports_on_revenue WHERE revenue > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, acquisition_channel, campaign_name FROM customer_acquisition JOIN reports_on_revenue ON customer_acquisition.campaign_id = reports_on_revenue.report_id;
SELECT DISTINCT campaign_name FROM reports_on_revenue WHERE roi > 0.5 ORDER BY campaign_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM example_table2 WHERE column6 LIKE '%keyword%'
SELECT * FROM Revenue_Report ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT report_id, campaign_name, revenue_amount FROM Revenue_Report WHERE revenue_amount > 1000;
SELECT DISTINCT campaign_name, acquisition_channel FROM Customer_Acquisition;
SELECT * FROM ROI_Report WHERE investment_amount < revenue_generated;
SELECT campaign_name, SUM(revenue_amount) AS total_revenue FROM Revenue_Report GROUP BY campaign_name;
SELECT * FROM Revenue_Report ORDER BY report_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT campaign_name, revenue_amount FROM Revenue_Report WHERE revenue_amount > 1000 ORDER BY revenue_amount DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, SUM(revenue_amount) AS total_revenue FROM Revenue_Report GROUP BY campaign_name HAVING SUM(revenue_amount) > 5000;

SELECT R.campaign_name, R.revenue_amount, C.acquisition_channel FROM Revenue_Report R JOIN Customer_Acquisition C ON R.campaign_name = C.campaign_name WHERE R.revenue_amount > 2000 AND C.acquisition_channel = 'Organic';

SELECT R.campaign_name, R.revenue_amount, ROI.investment_amount, ROI.revenue_generated FROM Revenue_Report R JOIN ROI_Report ROI ON R.campaign_name = ROI.campaign_name WHERE ROI.investment_amount > 500 AND ROI.revenue_generated > 2000 ORDER BY ROI.revenue_generated DESC;
SELECT * FROM campaign_performance;
SELECT campaign_id, impressions, clicks FROM campaign_performance WHERE impressions > 1000;
SELECT report_date, revenue_amount FROM revenue_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT acquisition_date, customer_id FROM customer_acquisition WHERE acquisition_channel = 'Organic';
SELECT campaign_id, roi_percentage FROM roi_metrics WHERE roi_percentage > 20;
SELECT * FROM revenue_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT campaign_id, revenue_amount FROM revenue_reports WHERE revenue_amount > 1000 ORDER BY revenue_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM campaign_performance WHERE impressions > 5000 AND clicks > 1000 ORDER BY conversions DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, roi_percentage FROM roi_metrics WHERE roi_date = '2022-01-01' ORDER BY roi_percentage DESC;
SELECT acquisition_channel, COUNT(customer_id) AS total_customers FROM customer_acquisition GROUP BY acquisition_channel HAVING COUNT(customer_id) > 10;
SELECT * FROM Revenue_Report;
SELECT campaign_name, revenue FROM Customer_Acquisition WHERE new_customers_count > 100;
SELECT report_id, roi FROM ROI_Report WHERE date_analyzed >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Marketing_Campaign ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT manager_id, manager_name, email FROM Campaign_Manager WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT campaign_name, revenue FROM Revenue_Report WHERE date_created BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Customer_Acquisition ORDER BY new_customers_count DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, investment, return, roi FROM ROI_Report WHERE date_analyzed = '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM Marketing_Campaign WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT manager_name, email FROM Campaign_Manager;
